name: Hop Land (Remix Level Designer)
description:
Hop Land enables anyone to create their own level inspired by 2D platformer games using components as sprites. We currently have galaxy, environment, and Candyland as our themes.


Hop Land was also created by Grace Ling, Nadia Le, and Marissa Liu as team Design Buddies for Camp Figma!


We will be continually adding more features and worlds to this file, so please check back for updates!


Design Buddies: https://designbuddies.community/

Join Design Buddies: https://discord.gg/rMEYCQt
